heading: HR00097
0: A RESOLUTION ENCOURAGING YOUNG FILIPINO INVENTORS TO CONTINUE BRINGING INTO BEING INNOVATIVE PRODUCTS AND IDEAS IN ORDER TO HELP BOOST THE NATIONAL ECONOMY BY PROVIDING THEM WITH MEANINGFUL AND REWARDING INCENTIVES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ACADEMIC CITATIONS, FINANCIAL AID, SCHOLARSHIPS AND GUARANTEED GOVERNMENT POSTS
status: Pending with the Committee on SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY since 2016-08-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00097
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION ENCOURAGING YOUNG FILIPINO INVENTORS TO CONTINUE BRINGING INTO BEING INNOVATIVE PRODUCTS AND IDEAS IN ORDER TO HELP BOOST THE NATIONAL ECONOMY BY PROVIDING THEM WITH MEANINGFUL AND REWARDING INCENTIVES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ACADEMIC CITATIONS, FINANCIAL AID, SCHOLARSHIPS AND GUARANTEED GOVERNMENT POSTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-20
